sentences.sContent: The wolf littered in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.sContent_eng: The wolf littered in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.sCn: 狼在一个没人居住的农家房子产仔。

sentences.sContent: After breaking out of jail, he hid out in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.sContent_eng: After breaking out of jail, he hid out in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.sCn: 他越狱后躲藏在一个无人居住的农舍里。

sentences.sContent: After breaking out of the jail， he hid out in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.sContent_eng: After breaking out of the jail， he hid out in a deserted farmhouse.
sentences.sCn: 他越狱后，暗藏在一个无人居住的农舍里。

trans.tranOther: the main house on a farm, where the farmer lives
